name: Roll Them Bones
description:
ROLL THEM BONES

It be the Pirate Code: a SPIDER on the DICE TABLE gets THE SQUISH.

But aye, if you help TILT THE ODDS in the crew's favor, they might let ye see another day.

Here's a hint... buccaneers always BET ON THEM BONES.

BLAST, DODGE, & WEB-UP DIZZYING DICE

In this twin-stick arcade action game, you play as a swashbuckling spider helping a pirate crew cheat at a... dicey... game. 

THE GOAL

Make sure dice land on BONES to win bets and earn cash for the crew. 

HOW TO PLAY
  1. Left Click -> Blast dice with your BLUNDERBUSS to keep them rolling
  2.  Right Click -> Stick dice with a WEB to slow them down to a halt
  3. WASD -> Evade oncoming dice to not get SMUSHED

When a die hits anything, it will REROLL and slow down.
If a die stops on BONES, you win the wager! Anything else? You're out of luck.

You have 2 minutes to make as much cash for your crew as possible and prove your worth. Go for a high score, lest ye be sent to the watery depths....

Made in 48 hours by Preston C. Taylor and Sam Kushell for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2022. Thanks for checking it out! We hope you like it!
